tool_description: Combines citations from multiple sources (files, databases, manual entries) into a single consolidated list.

source_lists.description: Multiple arrays of citations to merge

preserve_source_info.description: Whether to track which source each citation came from

remove_duplicates.description: Whether to automatically remove duplicates during merge

error_messages: Insufficient sources: Provide at least 2 source lists to merge.
Mismatched source labels: Number of source_labels must match number of source_lists.
Too many citations: Maximum 2000 total citations allowed across all sources.
Empty source list: All source lists must contain at least one citation.
usage: Provide source_lists array and corresponding source_labels. Optionally configure preserve_source_info and remove_duplicates for merge behavior.

merged_citations.description: Combined list of citations from all sources

source_mapping.description: Information about which source each citation came from

total_citations.description: Total number of citations in merged list

duplicates_removed.description: Number of duplicates removed during merge
